titleStmt.title: Die Mercurii 6. Maii, 1646. An ordinance of the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament: to command all Papists, officers, and souldiers of fortune, and such as have borne armes against the Parliament to depart and remove themselves twenty miles at the least distant from the city of London, &c. by the 12 of May, 1646. H. Elsynge Cler. Parl. D. Com.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.
